document_data.mainbody:
ouse Amarillis was a moon elf house descended from Kethryllia Amarillis, whose body was interred in the Hall of the Ancients in Leuthilspar. The house had no leader and its members tended not to specialise in any particular vocation. The house was known for its members tendency to leave Evermeet to explore Faer√ªn. The houses estate in Leuthilspar consisted of an exotic walled castle.
* Kethryllia Amarillis, founder of the house, deceased as of 1368 DR.
